review: The Apply TV works great, looks great and syncs great with my other apple products. The screen saver option was really cool and the iTunes radio is alright, but I prefer Pandora.And that is why I never use it. In fact, I haven't even set it up since I moved almost a year ago. There were only specific apps downloaded to the product and no other apps were available for purchase. Of those apps, a lot of them required a TV subscription or provider log in. A lot of the other apps were obscure Korean TV show channels or very odd channels that I found really pointless. I used the netflix app and that was about it. I think if I had known at the time that I would not be able to download apps I want onto my product, I would have gone with a different TV alternate. Maybe I should plug her in and see if anything has changed, though knowing apple, I doubt anything has.
